name: DuckPot
description:
Time to ponder my orb... Wait a minute these crows are stealing my treasure!

How can I power my Orb, ponder it, while dealing with all these crows, SIGH...

In Duckpot try to feed your orb as much treasure as you can while pesky thieving crows try to steal your coins and sabotage your magic dice.

Your magic dice are what you use to create your treasure BUT hitting it off your magical orb you can cast spells to aid you in your task at hand.

Sacrifice 1000 coins to the orb to win!

Game camera freezes due to bug just restart, Sorry!

Keyboard

  • Move: WASD
  • Camera Look: Mouse
  • Grab & Throw: Spacebar or Left Mouse Button

Gamepad

  • Move: Left Stick
  • Camera Look: Right Stick
  • Grab & Throw: Right Trigger or South Action Button (X on PS, A on Xbox)

Made in 48 hours for #GMTKJam2022 hosted by Game Maker's Toolkit

Reviews:
"Quacking good time" - Wizard ducks mom

"Down with capitalist wizards!" - Crow number 4

"I just want to be pondered... sniffle" - The Orb

Team

  • Andy Touch

  • Kal O'Brien
